forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: ambient occlusion

comments.text: so-called ambient occlusion creates natural-looking shadows around object edges and corners, and is currently active when in desktop mode. [imgur: CnzXQcL.jpg]
we hope to add it to vr mode too in the future.

thread.latestCommentText: we hope to add it to vr mode too in the future.
